justification: B trusts consensus and SoS; trading a Tier 2 RB with a friendly playoff schedule (Josh Garcia) for an OUT Tier 5 TE (Wright) and a volatile rookie WR (Baker) with tough playoff matchups misreads B’s incentives. Calling Garcia a “stable RB” and Wright a TE fix is inconsistent. The rationale is brief and generic, lacking role/tier/schedule specifics. Acceptance probability is overstated.
